meanings.definition: A person who scolds loudly or harshly
meanings.sent1: The outscolding from the neighbor could be heard throughout the street.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the outscolding in the neighborhood due to her loud reprimands.
meanings.sent3: The outscolding at the town hall meeting made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The outscolding in the play was portrayed by a talented actress.
meanings.sent5: The outscolding in the movie was so convincing, it made the audience jump.
